Posts.Content: Oct 3, 2013 05:04PM KR60 wrote: I have been exactly where you are!  I got the call about 3 months ago...same diagnosis.  I highly recommend the book The Breast Cancer Survival Manual by Dr. John Zink.  That book and the support of my friends and family are getting me through this.  I wish you all the best.
Posts.Title: In Total Shock!!!!!!! carissabforlife Kiko
